result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeremy Richard Wahlstrom

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 18, 2022 at 10:45 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
8:33 AM Defendant Jeremy Richard Wahlstrom appeared by video, in custody from Barron County Jail.  Attorney Joseph J. Kaupie appeared by video for Jeremy Richard Wahlstrom.  Attorney Jennifer Gross in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and recites appearances.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  Through Attny DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing.  Through Counsel enters NG Plea to Count 2.  Bond continues.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

8:29 AM Defendant Jeremy Richard Wahlstrom appeared by video from Barron County Jail.  Attorney Joseph J. Kaupie appeared by video for Jeremy Richard Wahlstrom.  Attorney Jennifer Gross in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances.  Attny Kaupie indicates has not reviewed criminal complaint with DEF.    Attny Kaupie request initial appearance to be reset, in order to review criminal complaint with DEF.   Court addresses DEF.
Off the Record:  Court addresses Attorney on filing of letter by Justice Point, request Attny discuss with DEF.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Initial appearance on August 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

11:08 AM DEF Jeremy Wahlstrom in court, appearing in custody by video from the Sawyer County Jail, with Atty Gabriel Pollak (special appearance) in court. Bruce R Poquette appeared in person for the State of WI.  Court calls case and recites appearances.  DE verifies DOB.  DE does not qualify for public defender.  Court finds probable cause.  State makes bond recommendation.  Atty Pollak No objection.  Court sets bond. SIBS $2500 ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-961-0149 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.   Court gives the DE the attorney colloquy.  Court sets INITIAL APPEARANCE for 8/23/2022 at 8:30AM.
